name: N_I_T_R_O System
description: The N_I_T_R_O (newtype injection trace reformed oldtype) System was a Psycommu system that granted Newtype abilities to Oldtype pilots. The greatest feature of the system was that when active, it caused the affected unit's drive system to emit what appeared to be blue flames. The system was originally developed in U.C. 0087 by the Titans, to allow the Psycho Gundam to operate more smoothly. However, the early n_i_t_r_o test units were deeply flawed, "burning through" their pilots and reducing them to a vegetative state after a single use. In U.C. 0094, an improved version of the n_i_t_r_o System was installed on the MSN-001X Gundam Delta Kai. While this version no longer "burned through" its pilot, prolonged use would cause the pilot's personality to become more violent and aggressive.

actions.name: Funnel Swarm
actions.detail: Choose 3 Hostile Targets within sensor range. You deploy a Drone in a free adjacent space; these Drones are targetable and can be destroyed. At the end of a chosen targets turn they must succeed on an Agility Save or take 4 Energy and 2 Burn Damage, and a Systems save or become Impaired. On a success, they they take half damage and are not Impaired.

name: Bio-Sensor
effect: 1/round, as a reaction, you may immediately move 2 spaces towards the closest enemy whenever a ranged or melee attack hits you. You may take 2 heat to increase this movement to 4 spaces.
description: A feature included due to request by the Earth Federation Forces, the Bio-Sensor was a simplified Psycommu device that enhanced the responsiveness of the mobile suit by supporting the mobile suit's control system with the pilot's brainwaves. However, since the system had limited effectiveness when used by regular pilots, the intention behind this inclusion was unclear.

name: Thermonuclear ramjet engines
effect: Gain a RPM Die a D6 starting at 0, every time you boost roll a d3 and add this number to the Die. As a free action you may reset this die to 0 and move spaces equal to the amount removed.

name: Permet Painted Armor

name: Mirasoul Flight Unit
effect: You may choose to count any and all of your movement as flying; however, you take Size +1 Heat at the end of any of your turns in which you fly this way. Additionally, make all Agility checks and saves at +1 Accuracy while Flying.
